member.name: T:RimTest.AssertionException
member.summary: Used when the condition expected from an assertion is not reached.
member.remarks: Throwing one indicates a test failure.

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertionException.#ctor
member.summary: constructor directly based on the base Exception

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertionException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: constructor directly based on the base Exception

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertionException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: constructor directly based on the base Exception

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertionException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: constructor directly based on the base Exception

member.name: T:RimTest.Assertion
member.summary: Generic assertion grammar object.
member.remarks: Usage: Assert(value)[.To|.Do|.Be|.Is|.Not].Comparison([Parameters...])

member.name: M:RimTest.Assertion.Assert(System.IComparable)
member.summary: Entry point for value based assertions
member.returns: An AssertValue, specialized in asserting values

member.name: M:RimTest.Assertion.AssertFunc(System.Func{System.Object})
member.summary: Entry point for Function based assertions
member.returns: An AssertFunc, specialized in asserting Functions

member.name: M:RimTest.Assertion.AssertFunc(System.Action)
member.summary: Entry point for Action based assertions
member.returns: An AssertAction, specialized in asserting Actions

member.name: F:RimTest.Assertion.negated
member.summary: Negation flag, can be double negated with multiple uses of the .Not grammar, used to negate a check expectation. (i.e. Assert(1).Not.To.Be.EqualTo(2))

member.name: T:RimTest.AssertValue
member.summary: Specialized Assertion for Values
member.remarks: Allows the EqualTo, LessThan, GreaterThan, BetweenInclusive, BetweenExclusive, TheSame, Null, True and False checks.

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertValue.#ctor(System.IComparable)
member.summary: base constructor

member.name: P:RimTest.AssertValue.Not
member.summary: Negation grammar link, negates the current assertion.
member.remarks: All grammar links can be chained as needed.

member.name: P:RimTest.AssertValue.To
member.summary: Grammar link, doesn't have any effect.
member.remarks: All grammar links can be chained as needed.

member.name: P:RimTest.AssertValue.Is
member.summary: Grammar link, doesn't have any effect.
member.remarks: All grammar links can be chained as needed.

member.name: P:RimTest.AssertValue.Be
member.summary: Grammar link, doesn't have any effect.
member.remarks: All grammar links can be chained as needed.

member.name: P:RimTest.AssertValue.Do
member.summary: Grammar link, doesn't have any effect.
member.remarks: All grammar links can be chained as needed.

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertValue.EqualTo(System.IComparable)
member.summary: Check: asserted value EQUALS TO otherThing

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertValue.LessThan(System.IComparable)
member.summary: Check: asserted value LESS THAN otherThing

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertValue.GreaterThan(System.IComparable)
member.summary: Check: asserted value GREATER THAN otherThing

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertValue.BetweenInclusive(System.IComparable,System.IComparable)
member.summary: Check: minThing LESS THAN or EQUAL TO assertd value AND asserted value LESS THAN or EQUAL TO maxThing

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertValue.BetweenExclusive(System.IComparable,System.IComparable)
member.summary: Check: minThing LESS THAN assertd value AND asserted value LESS THAN maxThing

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertValue.TheSame(System.IComparable)
member.summary: Check: asserted value SAME AS otherThing

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertValue.Null
member.summary: Check: thing IS null

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertValue.True
member.summary: Check: thing IS true

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertValue.False
member.summary: Check: thing IS false

member.name: T:RimTest.AssertFunc
member.summary: Specialized Assertion for Functions
member.remarks: Allows the Throw check.

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertFunc.#ctor(System.Func{System.Object})
member.summary: base constructor

member.name: P:RimTest.AssertFunc.Not
member.summary: Negation grammar link, negates the current assertion.
member.remarks: All grammar links can be chained as needed.

member.name: P:RimTest.AssertFunc.To
member.summary: Grammar link, doesn't have any effect.
member.remarks: All grammar links can be chained as needed.

member.name: P:RimTest.AssertFunc.Is
member.summary: Grammar link, doesn't have any effect.
member.remarks: All grammar links can be chained as needed.

member.summary: Grammar link, doesn't have any effect.
member.remarks: All grammar links can be chained as needed.

member.name: P:RimTest.AssertFunc.Do
member.summary: Grammar link, doesn't have any effect.
member.remarks: All grammar links can be chained as needed.

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertFunc.#ctor
member.summary: Internal constructor for AssertAction usage
member.remarks: Do NOT use manually

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertFunc.Throw
member.summary: Check: executing asserted callable throws an error.

member.summary: Specialized Assertion for Actions
member.remarks: Allows the Throw check.

member.summary: base constructor

member.summary: Grammar link, doesn't have any effect.
member.remarks: All grammar links can be chained as needed.

member.name: M:RimTest.AssertAction.Throw
member.summary: Check: executing asserted callable throws an error.

member.name: T:RimTest.Testing.AssemblyStatus
member.summary: Registered Assembly current test execution status.

member.name: F:RimTest.Testing.AssemblyStatus.ERROR
member.summary: Any test suite fails

member.name: F:RimTest.Testing.AssemblyStatus.WARNING
member.summary: Any test suite is skipped or have warnings

member.name: F:RimTest.Testing.AssemblyStatus.UNKNOWN
member.summary: Any test suite is not run

member.name: F:RimTest.Testing.AssemblyStatus.PASS
member.summary: All test suites are successful

member.name: T:RimTest.Testing.AssemblyStatusExtension
member.summary: Utils for AssemblyStatus

member.name: M:RimTest.Testing.AssemblyStatusExtension.StatusSymbol(RimTest.Testing.AssemblyStatus)
member.summary: Value to string symbol converter

member.name: T:RimTest.Testing.Runner
member.summary: Execute registered tests and update the status of registered tests, test suites and tested assemblies

member.name: M:RimTest.Testing.Runner.RunTest(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Check a test validity and run it if possible. Update the status to TestStatus.SKIP if invalid, TestStatus.PASS if succesfull, TestStatus.ERROR if failed. Registers any detected error to the test.

member.name: M:RimTest.Testing.Runner.RunTestSuite(System.Type)
member.summary: Check a test suite validity and run its tests if possible. Update the status to TestSuiteStatus.SKIP if invalid, then TestSuiteStatus.ERROR if any test fails, then TestSuiteStatus.WARNING if any test is skipped, then TestSuiteStatus.UNKNOWN if any test is not run, then TestSuiteStatus.PASS if succesfull. Registers any detected error to the test suite.

member.name: M:RimTest.Testing.Runner.RunAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Run a assembly test suites. Update the status to AssemblyStatus.ERROR if any test suite fails, then AssemblyStatus.WARNING if any test suite is skipped or have warnings, then AssemblyStatus.UNKNOWN if any test suite is not run, then AssemblyStatus.PASS if succesfull. Registers any detected error to the test suite.

member.name: T:RimTest.Testing.AssemblyExplorer
member.summary: Stores and manages Assembly level data, aka known statuses and exceptions.

member.name: M:RimTest.Testing.AssemblyExplorer.GetAssemblyStatus(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.returns: The current registered AssemblyStatus else AssemblyStatus.UNKNOWN

member.name: M:RimTest.Testing.AssemblyExplorer.GetAssemblyError(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.returns: The current registered Exception else null if none registered

member.name: T:RimTest.Testing.Assembly2TestSuiteLink
member.summary: Stores and manage the links between registered assemblies and their registered test suites

member.name: M:RimTest.Testing.Assembly2TestSuiteLink.RegisterTestSuite2Asm(System.Type,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Can register multiple unique test suites to the same assembly. Will not store duplicates.

member.name: M:RimTest.Testing.Assembly2TestSuiteLink.GetAssemblies
member.returns: A list of all known assemblies

member.name: M:RimTest.Testing.Assembly2TestSuiteLink.GetTestSuites(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.returns: A set of registered tests suites for this assembly. Returns an empty set if the assembly is not registered.

member.name: T:RimTest.Testing.TestSuiteExplorer
member.summary: Stores and manages Test Suite level data, aka known statuses and exceptions.

member.name: M:RimTest.Testing.TestSuiteExplorer.GetTestSuiteError(System.Type)
member.returns: current registered Exception else null if none registered

member.name: T:RimTest.Testing.TestSuite2TestLink
member.summary: Stores and manage the links between registered test suites and their registered tests

member.name: M:RimTest.Testing.TestSuite2TestLink.GetTests(System.Type)
member.returns: A set of registered tests for this test suite. Returns an empty set if the test suite is not registered.

member.name: T:RimTest.Testing.TestExplorer
member.summary: Stores and manages Test level data, aka known statuses and exceptions.

member.name: M:RimTest.Testing.TestExplorer.GetTestError(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.returns: current registered Exception else null if none registered

member.name: T:RimTest.Testing.Explorer
member.summary: Explores and registers every tested assembly, test suites and tests currently loaded.

member.summary: Registered Test current execution status.

member.name: F:RimTest.Testing.TestStatus.SKIP
member.summary: invalid test

member.summary: not run yet

member.summary: failed

member.name: F:RimTest.Testing.TestStatus.PASS
member.summary: passed

member.name: T:RimTest.Testing.TestStatusExtension
member.summary: Utils for TestStatus

member.summary: Value to string symbol converter

member.summary: Registered Test Suite current test execution status.

member.name: F:RimTest.Testing.TestSuiteStatus.SKIP
member.summary: Invalid Test Suite

member.name: F:RimTest.Testing.TestSuiteStatus.ERROR
member.summary: Any test fails

member.name: F:RimTest.Testing.TestSuiteStatus.WARNING
member.summary: Any test skipped

member.name: F:RimTest.Testing.TestSuiteStatus.UNKNOWN
member.summary: Any test is not run

member.name: F:RimTest.Testing.TestSuiteStatus.PASS
member.summary: All tests are successful

member.name: T:RimTest.Testing.TestSuiteStatusExtension
member.summary: Utils for TestStatus

member.name: M:RimTest.Testing.TestSuiteStatusExtension.StatusSymbol(RimTest.Testing.TestSuiteStatus)
member.summary: Value to string symbol converter

member.name: T:RimTest.Test
member.summary: Test function meta-attribute, used to register a function as a test to be discovered by RimTest.
member.remarks: Only used when the test function is a method of a class with the meta-attribute TestSuite. Valid Tests have a void signature, are static, public and do not accept parameters, see code example

member.name: T:RimTest.RimTestMod
member.summary: This is the mod entry point run when every assemblies of loaded mods are now loaded and available.
member.remarks: We can run test discovery at this point.

member.name: M:RimTest.RimTestMod.#cctor
member.summary: Said entry point

member.name: T:RimTest.TestSuite
member.summary: TestSuite meta-attribute, used to register a class as a test suite to be discovered by RimTest.
member.remarks: Only used when the class contains valid tests functions decorated with the meta-attribute Test. Valid Test Suites are static and public, see code example

member.name: T:RimTest.Util.Tally`1
member.summary: Dictionnary<T, int> auto defaulting to 0. Allows simple tallying syntax such as tally[element]++
